query.name: find-all-by-status
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE current_version > reported_version AND status = ${status}

query.name: insert-or-update-current-version
query.statement: INSERT INTO <TABLE/>(<FIELDS/>) VALUES(<VALUES/>) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE <FIELD name='current-version'/> = ${current-version}, <FIELD name='status'/> = ${status}, <FIELD name='description'/> = ${description}, <FIELD name="data-change-last-time"/> = NOW()

query.name: update-reported-version-by-group
query.statement: UPDATE <TABLE/> SET <FIELD name='reported-version'/> = ${reported-version}, <FIELD name='status'/> = ${status}, <FIELD name='description'/> = ${description}, <FIELD name="data-change-last-time"/> = NOW() WHERE <FIELD name='group-id'/> = ${group-id}

query.name: update-error-status-by-group
query.statement: UPDATE <TABLE/> SET <FIELD name='status'/> = ${status}, <FIELD name='description'/> = ${description}, <FIELD name="data-change-last-time"/> = NOW() WHERE <FIELD name='group-id'/> = ${group-id}
